list_definition.definition: the space behind the principal or most important figures or objects of a picture etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He always paints ships against a background of stormy skies
She had drawn some trees in the background of the picture.

list_definition.definition: happenings that go before, and help to explain, an event etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He explained the background of the current situation.
She was ashamed of her humble background.
